changelog: v1.5.18: TTS crash hardening — pyttsx3 COM init fix + BaseException catch, bulletproof Wes Mode identity check.
changes: FIX: pyttsx3 COM crash — pythoncom.CoInitialize() called before pyttsx3.init() in TTS thread on Windows
FIX: TTS thread now catches BaseException (not just Exception) — fatal C-level COM errors can no longer kill the process
FIX: All Wes Mode identity check functions wrapped in try/catch — any failure skips Wes Mode gracefully
FIX: Null checks on all getElementById calls in Wes identity/calibration flow
FIX: DOMContentLoaded Wes auto-launch handler wrapped in try/catch
NEW: install_helper.bat — unblocks Mark of the Web on Windows before running installer
NEW: Landing page install guide — 3-step instructions + dual download buttons (exe + helper)
